mapper.delete: delete from videos where id = #{id} and userId = #{userId}
mapper.update: update videos set views = views + 1 where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id,userId,userName,title,views,likes, category,duration,createdAt from videos where match(title,category,description,tags) against(#{keyword} in natural language mode)
select id,userId,userName,title,views,likes, category,duration,createdAt from videos where userId=#{userId} and status = 'waitToReview'
select id,userId,userName,title,views,likes, category,duration,createdAt from videos where userId=#{userId} and status = 'approved'
select id,userId,userName,title,views,likes, category,duration,createdAt,reviewNotes from videos where userId=#{userId} and status = 'rejected'
select id,userId,userName,title,views,likes, category,duration,createdAt from videos where status = 'waitToReview'
